short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Open source, privacy first bug reporting for your website

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: TagBug is a bug reporting tool for your website. You can use TagBug to send bug report with technical details engineers want. Bug reports can be annotated screenshots, video recordings or instant replay of the last few minutes with critical technical information developers need.
